label: 太宰春台
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1680-1747) [One of the prominent most prominent among Ogyū Sorai's students], whose principal work on political economy, Keizairoku, would be among the most widely read treatises on this subject throughout the remainder of the Tokugawa period (p. 610). [荻生徂徠、経済録]
